alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; Lincoln; McClain; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:57AM CDT until July 07 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Eastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 757 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oklahoma City to near Del City to near Norman, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Norman, Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Shawnee, Del City, Newcastle, Tecumseh, Bethany, Mustang, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Noble, Tuttle, Piedmont, Harrah, Slaughterville, and McLoud. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; Lincoln; McClain; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie
